item.title: Drummond of Megginch Tartan thread counts
item.description: Given thread counts produce table Wait for this to come out test = "R14 DB2 R4 DB4 R70 LB4 R4 DB20 R4 G4 R4 G74 R6 DB4 R12" import re PATTERN = re.compile("([a-zA-Z]*)(\d*)") def split_thread(threadcount): """Given a thread count such as R14, will split to R and integer 14""" match = re.search(PATTERN, threadcount) if match: return match.group(1),match.group(2) return threadcount,"" class Stripe: def __init__(self, short_colour, count): self.short_colour = short_colour self.count = int(count) def __str__(self): return f"{self.
